text:
I'm sorry, I thought I'd wait until you finished,
...The bandages, are you okay?

...Towards the debut live...
I want to... not be nervous, even a little...

I see... Okay, I understand.
Just keep me updated on your progress.

Oh, and also—
It looks like the concept will be Gothic!

It's because of the opportunity everyone gave us,
so I'm going to make it happen for sure.

Thank you...
It's something we decided together with everyone...

I want to do my best...
to be of any help, even a little...!
